name: SkyCurtains
description:
The fluffball spirit wants to get home, but carnivorous monsters stand in his way!

Use the cursor to draw a skycurtain and protect your fluffball from predators! Create a path to the gateway, but make sure you get there quickly, as the curtains can't stay open forever!

Team
  • Lead - Jackson Wong (Website)
  • Programming - Allan Bai (itch.io)
  • Character Art - Kirsti Hogan (Twitter)
  • Environment Art - Alejandra Vargas Coronado (Instagram) | (Behance)
  • UI Art - Kimleng Cheav (Instagram)
  • Music and Sound - Andy Chiang
